alert.note: Alert for Caddo (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 17 at 5:35PM CDT until June 17 at 6:15PM CDT by NWS Shreveport
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 615 PM CDT FOR SOUTHWESTERN CADDO PARISH IN NORTHWESTERN LOUISIANA AND SOUTHEASTERN HARRISON COUNTIES... At 535 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Waskom, or 12 miles east of Marshall, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Shreveport, Greenwood, Blanchard, Waskom, Mooringsport, Scottsville, Jonesville, Caddo Lake, Cross Lake, Bethany and Leigh. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
